attributes.action: The UK should not get involved with any conflict with Iran
attributes.additional_details: We should be working with all parties to find a peaceful solution for this latest conflict.
attributes.background: The UK government should publicly commit to not getting involved in another needless war in the middle east. We already took action against Iraq against the wishes of the general public and we should not repeat this same mistake with Iran.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Commit to no military involvement in attacks on Iran: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730360
